experience: You and Panos both know Mohsen Gamshad, Matthew Cato, and 24 others
IoT May Need Sub-50-Cent SoCs | EE Times

Based on current PhD research, founded company to focus on computational large scale non-linear probabilistic optimal control problems utilizing novel machine learning algorithms.  Innovation includes fast adaptive evaluation of high dimensional integrals for determination of statistical quantities for real time decision making.

Led team of consultants and full time employees in integrating and migrating LIMS legacy Swing/JEE applications to a modern SOA and web front end architecture (GWT). Introduced test driven development methodologies, agile practices and a new team communications model.  Managed, architected implemented example applications, and documented architecture using a UML blueprinting methodology for collaborative development.

Director for large scale wealth management automation platform using agile frameworks and methodologies for rapid application development.Led team that delivered trading portfolio rebalancing application in just sixty days which was a record for the firm.Created efficient development processes that enabled the timely penetration of competitive advice delivery market. Co-developed and implemented scalable SOA architecture for web applications with over two hundred thousand hits a day. Promoted use of dependency injection frameworks in Java (Spring) to improve quality of development. Created and managed offshore/onshore co-development methodology based on MDA principles and UML. Performed strategic business process/technology alignment analysis. Active participant in SOA Enterprise architecture adoption for Schwab. Recipient of numerous Excellence in Service awards including➢	Grid implementation➢	Planning and Portfolio Rebalancing➢	Portfolio Rebalancing Trading Automation
Designed and implemented version control for XML documents that were being utilized for customizing the look and feel of company applications.

6 week intensive dog training course based on scientific evolutionary biology principles, taught by the legendary Jean Donaldson.  Course was to enable more effective volunteering at the San Francisco Animal Care and Control.

Advanced undergraduate classes in Molecular Biology, Genenetics, Neurobiology, Biochemistry, Organic Chemistry, Cancer and Developmental Biology.  Some courses were taken at UC Berkeley proper through Concurrent Enrollment and some through Extension.

Advanced undergraduate classes in Molecular Biology, Genenetics, Neurobiology, Biochemistry, Organic Chemistry, Cancer and Developmental Biology.  Some courses were taken at UC Berkeley proper through Concurrent Enrollment and some through Extension.
Currently studying Applying Mathematics and Statistics with emphasis on Optimization and Control. Current research involves optimal nonlinear control theory under uncertainty.

It gives me immense pleasure to recommend Panos whom I worked at Charles Schwab for over 6 years. Panos has extensive experience in architecture, design, development  of software systems along with project management.  Panos is also a visionary, evangelist and always ahead of the curve in introducing new technologies to address the  complex problems and creating new solutions to address the needs to customer service representatives at the branch offices and the end customers using the net.  He has a unique ability to research and explain inherent problems both in terms of usability or efficiency and to come up with solutions that addresses these issues. Needless to say, Panos has won several awards including the prestigious Schwab Technology leader award for his contributions to the company.

Qi Gong
Associate Professor at University of California, Santa Cruz
September 25, 2017, Qi managed Panos directly

Panos has comprehensive knowledge on numerical optimization, computational optimal control, and parallel programming. He is fast learner, able to master new mathematical concepts, technical skills, and adapt them to solve real-world problems. Panos started to work with my research group in 2014 on a trajectory optimization problem for a swarm of autonomous vehicles, a new field to him. Within a very short period, he was able to develop a novel parallel optimization algorithm that improved run-time by several orders of magnitude. His algorithm was instrumental for the success of our research project. Since 2014 I have collaborated with Panos on multiple research topics. I was so impressive by his ability to conduct independent research. He has not only a solid technical background, but, most importantly, a broad vision that enables him to identify important research topics and find innovative solutions.

Michael L. Taylor
Software Contractor/Consultant, CEO at MLT, Inc.
April 15, 2011, Michael L. reported directly to Panos

Panos has a very insightful and analytical mind - very adept in dissecting a business requirement and it business process flow (even those that are a bit nebulous) into a technical solution.  Relentlessly progressive with technological research, he achieves the best possible solution to whatever technical challenge there may be.  Then, using sound software engineering practices, he develops software noted for its ease-of-use, performance, reliability, and maintainability.  He has an inner-drive fueling him to complete any technical mission.An instant "game-changer", Panos brings energy and technical brilliance to any team.  He immediately raises the level of his or her co-worker's "game".  His vision allows him to sidestep future operational and technical problems that may arise in a firm.  His work saves time and money in software development and operational use.  Few people understand the true cost of software development through its cycle of design, development, testing, and maintenance and the monetary savings in operational use in a business process flow.  Panos emphatically embodies efficacy.A supreme pleasure and honor to work for and with him.

Chalon Mullins
Principal Enterprise Architect at Kaiser Permanente IT
March 10, 2009, Chalon worked with Panos in different groups

Panos was the architect for the application side of the project that used Grid technology where I was the overall system architect at Schwab.  Many other application architects would have balked at using this relatively new technology for a key project, but Panos was a great partner.  Moreover, it was one of the best projects I've worked on for using modeling -- I developed the overall systems model in UML, and we were able to hand that over to Panos' team who adopted the model to show the application side.  They were also able to generate code for the model.All in all, we deployed a key new project on a new technology platform in roughly 9 months, including substantial work on the application side.  Panos' leadership of the application team was absolutely critical to that success.

KG Muthukumar
Analytics, Business Intelligence, Enterprise SW, Product Management
October 29, 2012, KG worked with Panos in the same group

KG Muthukumar is a talented executive, who displays the amphibious ability of functioning in both the business and technology world with equal adroitness.  While I worked with KG at Schwab, he developed the CRM system from a nascent disorganized collection of databases to a mature analytical engine, capable of teasing out new client marketing opportunities.  Moreover KG worked very hard to develop intuitive user interfaces and an enterprise level messaging system to allow end business users the ability to analyse user needs with great ease and insight.KG was very well regarded in the firm as a "can do" person.  His ability to anticipate the business needs was well known and the services of the group he managed were sought after.  KG is a great believer in cultivating strong inter-personal relationships and is a great joy to work with. He has a keen intellect and learns new business models and technologies very quickly.KG is also able to build technology teams "de novo" and to foster a team spirit and cultivate company loyalty.  He started out managing a small team at Schwab, and as his influence grew, he ended up managing a very large group fulfilling a role more senior than what his title suggested.I would not hesitate to endorse KG as a technology or business executive.  He would be a great asset for whoever would be fortunate enough to hire him.

Peter Washburn
Senior Technical Manager, Windhaven Research at Windhaven Investment Management, Inc.
June 12, 2012, Panos managed Peter directly

Peter is an incredible talent.  He combines deep knowledge of software engineering, mathematics and economics to be the only person in the group responsible for scaling quantitative models to enterprise levels.  He was the technical lead entrusted with making Schwab Equity Ratings publishable on schwab.com.  Peter also implement a number of financial quantitative models in C++ and made them accessible to applications running on the web platform, where scalability was of paramount concern.  Peter is an expert in number of technologies not just quantitative ones.  In addition to C++ and Matlab, Peter is a C# and Java expert.  Peter is also a fantastic team player and technical leader.  He possesses excellent communication skills, has excellent mentoring skills and has led both offshore and onshore teams.  Peter would be an asset to any technical team he chooses to join.

summary: Experienced Mathematician and Systems Architect specializing in creating innovative systems and applications in the areas of nonlinear Optimization and Control, Statistics, Data Science and Wealth Management Optimization.Knowledgeable and prolific software engineer with over fifteen years of cross-platform distributed computing experience, including all aspects of the systems development lifecycle. Demonstrated success as a technical leader and manager with strong analytical, design, programming and mentoring skills. Specializes in delivering products under very tight deadlines. Created development methodology that allows teams to "spin on a dime" as requirements change.Domain experience in financial, telecommunications and biotech sectors. Delivers domain-driven, value-based business process improvements with and without automation.Quantitative expert-able to deliver end to end analysis and implementation. Passionate about building systems that delight Clients-absolutely focused on delivering high quality low maintenance systems that optimize whatever is important to the Client: operational efficiency, greater usability, scalability, greater automation, simplicity.
